measurements_data.comments: 9 (Legislation does not clearly differentiate between industrial and municipal waste. Existing law defines waste from production and consumption; hence, waste statistics include both types of waste)

measurements_data.comments: OD: Calculated based on the amount deposited compared to the amount of waste generated; RE: Calculated based on the amount recycled compared to the amount of waste generated
